title: Can I Run LoL??
body:
My Pc 
Core 2 Duo 2.2ghz
4gb Ram
Geforce 210 1gb Vram
500gb HDD

replies.body:
Those specs certainly meet our [minimum system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/), so you should ideally have no issues running League! :)

Let me know if you have any questions.

If by lag, you mean Latency (ping), that would rely on factors outside of your PC's hardware specs. Latency to a server is largely determined by both your local network configuration and your ISP routing to that server. 

If you run into issues with your latency, get back to me and I'll assist you further.
